steps.commandline: fastq-dump --split-files $SAMPLE
steps.title: Download

steps.commandline: mkdir fastqc_before; fastqc --nogroup --extract ${SAMPLE}_1.fastq -o fastqc_before && fastqc --nogroup --extract ${SAMPLE}_2.fastq -o fastqc_before
steps.title: Fastqc_before

steps.commandline: java -jar $TRIMMOMATIC_HOME/trimmomatic-0.36.jar PE -threads 36 -phred33 ${SAMPLE}_1.fastq ${SAMPLE}_2.fastq ${SAMPLE}_1.trimmed.paired.fastq ${SAMPLE}_1.trimmed.unpaired.fastq ${SAMPLE}_2.trimmed.paired.fastq ${SAMPLE}_2.trimmed.unpaired.fastq ILLUMINACLIP:$TRIMMOMATIC_HOME/adapters/TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 MINLEN:36 LEADING:3 TRAILING:3
steps.title: Trimming

steps.commandline: mkdir fastqc_after; fastqc --nogroup --extract ${SAMPLE}_1.fastq -o fastqc_before && fastqc --nogroup --extract ${SAMPLE}_2.fastq -o fastqc_after
steps.title: Fastqc_after

steps.commandline: bwa mem -t ${cpu_variable} -M $REFERENCE ${SAMPLE}_1.trimmed.paired.fastq ${SAMPLE}_2.trimmed.paired.fastq > ${SAMPLE}.sam
steps.title: Mapping

steps.commandline:
TMP=${SAMPLE}_dir/tmp
java -Xmx2g -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -jar $PICARDTOOLS_HOME/bin/picard.jar SortSam I=${SAMPLE}.sam O=${SAMPLE}_sorted.bam SO=coordinate
steps.title: Sorting

steps.commandline: java -Xmx2g -jar $PICARDTOOLS_HOME/bin/picard.jar MergeSamFiles OUTPUT=$EXPERIMENT.bam $(for s in $(cat samples); do echo "INPUT=$s/${s}_sorted.bam"; done)
steps.title: MergeBams

steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp/"
mkdir $TMP
java -Xmx2g -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP \
    -jar $PICARDTOOLS_HOME/bin/picard.jar AddOrReplaceReadGroups \
    I=$EXPERIMENT.bam \
    O=$EXPERIMENT.dedupAdd.bam \
    RGID=$EXPERIMENT \
    RGLB=lib1 \
    RGPL=illumina \
    RGPU=unit1 \
    RGSM=$EXPERIMENT
steps.title: AddOrReplaceReadGroups

steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp/"
java -Xmx2g -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -jar $PICARDTOOLS_HOME/bin/picard.jar BuildBamIndex I=$EXPERIMENT.dedupAdd.bam
steps.title: Indexing

steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp"
java -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -Xmx32G -Xms4G \
	-jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
	-T HaplotypeCaller \
	-R $REFERENCE \
	-I $EXPERIMENT.dedupAdd.bam \
	--emitRefConfidence GVCF \
	--variant_index_type LINEAR \
	--variant_index_parameter 128000 \
	-nct ${cpu_variable} \
	-o $EXPERIMENT.g.vcf
steps.title: HaplotypeCaller

steps.commandline: echo $EXPERIMENT/$EXPERIMENT.g.vcf >> ../vcf_list.list
steps.title: PrepareGenotypeGVCF

steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp"
java -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -Xmx32G \
    -jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
    -T GenotypeGVCFs \
    -R $REFERENCE \
    -V vcf_list.list \
    -stand_call_conf 30 \
    -stand_emit_conf 10 \
    -nt 10 \
    -o Combined.vcf
steps.title: GenotypeGVCF

steps.commandline:
java -jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
    -T SelectVariants \
    -R $REFERENCE \
    -V Combined.vcf \
    -selectType SNP \
    -o raw_snps.vcf
steps.title: SNPextraction

steps.commandline:
java -jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
    -T SelectVariants \
    -R $REFERENCE\
    -V Combined.vcf \
    -selectType INDEL \
    -o raw_indels.vcf
steps.title: INDELSextraction

steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp_snps"
java -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -Xmx32G \
    -jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
    -T VariantFiltration \
    -R $REFERENCE \
    -V raw_snps.vcf \
    --filterExpression "QD < 2.0 || FS > 60.0 || MQ < 40.0 || MQRankSum < -12.5 || ReadPosRankSum < -8.0" \
    --filterName "my_snp_filter" \
    -o Combined_snps_filt.vcf
steps.title: SNPfiltering

steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp_indels"
java -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -Xmx32G \
    -jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
    -T VariantFiltration \
    -R $REFERENCE \
    -V raw_indels.vcf \
    --filterExpression "QD < 2.0 || FS > 200.0 || ReadPosRankSum < -20.0 || InbreedingCoeff < -0.8 || SOR > 10" \
    --filterName "my_snp_filter" \
    -o Combined_indels_filt.vcf
steps.title: INDELSfiltering

steps.commandline:
>dedupAdd.txt

for EXPERIMENT in `cat experiments`
do
    readlink -f $EXPERIMENT/$EXPERIMENT.dedupAdd.bam >> dedupAdd.txt
done
steps.title: PrepareBcftoools

steps.commandline:
cut -f1 $REFERENCE.fai | xargs -I {} -P 36 sh -c "samtools mpileup -g -B -C50 -m 4 -f $REFERENCE -r \"{}\" -b dedupAdd.txt | bcftools call -mv -O v -o bcf_\"{}\"_part.vcf"

>list.txt
for i in bcf_*_part.vcf; do 
    echo $(pwd)/$i >> list.txt;
done

bcftools concat -f list.txt --output bcftools_concat.g.vcf
gzip bcftools_concat.g.vcf

bcftools view bcftools_concat.g.vcf.gz -v snps > bcftools_concat_snps.g.vcf
bcftools view bcftools_concat.g.vcf.gz -v indels > bcftools_concat_indels.g.vcf
steps.title: BcfTools

steps.commandline:
cut -f1 $REFERENCE.fai | xargs -P 36 -I {} sh -c "freebayes -f $REFERENCE -r {} -C 5 -L dedupAdd.txt > part.fb.\"{}\".vcf"

>list.txt
for i in part.fb*.vcf; do 
    echo $(pwd)/$i >> list.txt;
done

bcftools concat -f list.txt --output freebayes_concat.g.vcf
gzip freebayes_concat.g.vcf
bcftools view freebayes_concat.g.vcf.gz -v snps > freebayes_concat_snps.g.vcf
bcftools view freebayes_concat.g.vcf.gz -v indels > freebayes_concat_indels.g.vcf
steps.title: Freebayes

steps.commandline: 14_june_18_intersect.snps.with.infos.pl bcftools_concat_snps.g.vcf freebayes_concat_snps.g.vcf Combined_snps_filt.vcf
steps.title: ConsensusSNPS

steps.commandline: 14_june_18_intersect.indels.with.infos.pl bcftools_concat_indels.g.vcf freebayes_concat_indels.g.vcf Combined_indels_filt.vcf
steps.title: ConsensusINDELs
